name: Protect Knight
description:
2D Action Platformer, with Roguelite elements. You play as a shield hero, can you save the princess? 

Controls:

A D - Move left and right 

Space - Jump (Double jump) 

Double A/D - Dash 

S - Hide behind your shield 

1,2,3 - Activate inventory items 

Shift + 1,2,3 - Drop inventory items 

E - Pick up shield from chest

To open chests and kill enemies you need to dash into them. When you run out of lives, you die. But, There is One last Thing you get to keep when respawning: Your shield

Art by: NoNinja

Programmed by: Dobbermann2

Music/Sound by: Wyron Roberth
